data.description: Introduces machine learning based synthesis and manipulation of visual data (images and videos).  Both classical (e.g., nearest neighbor, filtering) and modern deep learning based (e.g., ConvNets, GANs, Diffusion Models) algorithms will be presented for image representation, synthesis, and manipulation. Usage of self-developed algorithms for image synthesis and manipulation to understand and analyze state-of-the-art techniques, and to identify interesting open questions and future directions.
data.title: LEARNING BASED IMAGE SYNTHESIS AND MANIPULATION
